"About [Mining Base Defense Training]": "Mining Base Defense Training is a quest to defend the site against a heavy attack from Darkers.  The quest is cleared when there is at least one site remaining after the end of the last \"wave\"."
"During the Mining Base Defense Training, by gathering crystals, a variety of support functions will be enabled for use.  Each player can use each function once. Use them during critical situations."

"Effects of Support are as follows:  - Burst Barrier (use from site terminal) Attacking Darkers will be frozen when they touch the selected base. In addition, it can destroy base corruption.  Health Recovery (use from site terminal) Site's health points can be recovered slightly.  Turret Setup (use from defense socket) Turret is setup in Defense Socket  Photon Cannon Setup (use from defense socket) Photon Cannon is setup in Defense Socket."

"Darkers can use \"Corruption\" as weapon to attack the towers.  Darker Corruption can cling onto the site and cause damage. As damage will become more severe the larger they grow, find them quickly and destroy them."

"When a warning appears at the start of wave, it means that the Darkers have become stronger. Be aware that their HP and attack power will also become higher than normal.  In addition, when the Darkers become stronger, it is possible to gain better wave rewards. "

"In this quest, except for Boss Enemies, there are <yellow>no<c> items and meseta <yellow>dropped<c> after defeating them.  Instead, once the quest is cleared, destroy the container that appears and a large number of items will be dropped.  *However, no order items or matter board item will be dropped."
"During the Mining Base Defense Training, degree of active contributions will be displayed.  Let's send \"Thumbs-ups\" and friend requests to those players you like and who have been a great help."
